articles.content:
Greetings to President of Chile
    Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidiumbof the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ricardo Lagos Escobar, president of Chile, on Saturday on the occasion of the 194th anniversary of the independence of the country.
 The message wished the president greater achievements in his work for the peace and prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of St. Kitts-Nevis
    Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Denzil Douglas, prime minister of St. Kitts-Nevis, on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of its independence.
 The message expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would favorably develop and wished the prime minister success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of the people.
